评论详情: Much, much shorter than in the picture. Slightly see-through. Okay quality, decently soft.

Large size reviewed. Material is something like polyester and not cotton.  Sleeve and collar ribbing do not lay flat due to wonky stitching.  Image (cat) is a weird iron-on that's made up of a bunch of "X's".  Length is nothing like the image.  It is cropped about 3 inches shorter (might be ok if that's your preference).
I got this for her birthday/valentines and she was very happy
